item.title: Picture Perfect? The Impact of Images in Second-Hand Marketplaces
item.description: This article investigates the role of images in influencing sales in second-hand marketplaces.

item.title: From Courtrooms to Charts: the Impact of Kavanaugh's Appointment on Music Consumption
item.description: This study examines the impact of Brett Kavanaugh's Supreme Court appointment on U.S. music consumption, specifically exploring changes in streaming patterns on Spotify.

item.title: Data Analysis in Economics 1: Collection and Visualization
item.description: Graduate course on data collection and visualization

item.title: Country Music: Strategic Incentives of Competing Voters
item.description: This article analyzes the strategic robustness of positional voting systems using Eurovision Song Contest data. Our findings reveal strategic voting behaviors, particularly among jury members, influenced by information from the semifinal stage rather than the quality of the songs.

item.title: Data analysis in economics 2: Applied Econometrics

item.title: Bologna citta 30
item.description:
Grafico sulla gravita degli incidenti

Ad un primo sguardo sembrano scendere i codici rossi ed aumentare i codici gialli dopo 2 mesi dall’introduzione di “Bologna citta 30”

number of incidents

The number of incidents seems to be approximately the same

number of incidents in percentage

The number of red codes decreases and it increases the number of green code

Ad un primo sguardo gli incidenti sembrano essere nelle stesse aree
